text: Thören is a village on the southern edge of the Lüneburg Heath in the north German state of Lower Saxony. It is in the Aller-Leine Valley and is an Ortschaft (municipal division) of the municipality of Winsen (Aller).Hauptsatzung der Gemeinde Winsen (Aller) , December 2020. == References == == Other websites == * Thören website * Winsen (Aller) website * German Oil Museum in Wietze Category:Villages in Lower Saxony Category:Lüneburg Heath Category:Winsen an der Aller
title: Thören
